MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Clayton Terrace and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site at Broompark Drive and in order to complete repairs to damaged electrical equipment caused by a third party  we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 00:08 on 27th October 2020.
